title: Yujun Lian
text:
我的 个人主页 是基于 Chi Zhang (github) 的个人主页修改而来的。
你可以 Fork 本仓库，然后酌情修改你的个人信息，编译后即可生成你的个人主页。这种方法无需注册域名，也不用学习 HTML 和 CSS 等前端知识，直接使用 GitHub Pages 即可完成个人主页的搭建。
具体制作过程参见：

连小白, 2025, 50 分钟搞定个人主页：Fork 模板 + GitHub Pages + Quarto 完整教程.

本仓库的使用方法：

你可以点击本页右上方的 ⭐Star 按钮来收藏本仓库，方便日后查阅；
也可以点击 Use this template 按钮来快速 Fork 本仓库。
你制作个人主页期间有任何问题，可以在 Discussions 提问和讨论。



主页 | 课程 | 视频 | 推文 | 资料

title: Li Xuecong
text:
xuecong.li@tecnico.ulisboa.pt
  
  
    
     arlionn
  

  
  
Li Xuecong Now is doing Ph.D study in University of Lisbon/Institute of systems and robots Lisbon The initial motivation for his research idea was to design a user-friendly human-computer interaction paradigm for 3D Appearance Authoring based on Gaussion splatting. The goal was to allow for semantically-unconstrained scribbling on 2D images (such as applying custom textures or markings), thereby addressing the core problems of geometric ambiguity and limited creative freedom.



2025 - Present: Ph.D candicate,University of Lisbon,Programe of Digital Media
2023-2024: Master in Science, University of Exeter, UK, specializing in Aplied Data Science and Statistics
2016-2020: Bachelor of Economics, Shenyang Aerospacce University, China, majoring in International Economics and Trade.
